professional_summary: Experienced Branch Manager and Floral Designer with proven track record of exceeding sales goals, building customer relationships, and delivering high-quality customer service. Strong leadership skills in staff development and business operations management.

work_experience.description: Managing branch operations, customer service, and floral design while leading team and maintaining sales goals
responsibilities: Managed customer service and administrative tasks

work_experience.description: Provided bilingual customer support for medical supplies and medication orders
responsibilities: Assisted Spanish-speaking customers with medication orders and refills
Explained insurance benefits and verified medical supplies
Processed credit card payments and handled customer accounts
Met daily, weekly, and monthly production quotas

work_experience.description: Handled insurance verification and customer support in a production-based environment
responsibilities: Assisted case managers with daily case load
Managed inbound and outbound customer calls
